mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reservation r JOIN store s ON r.user_id = s.member_id WHERE r.status = #{status} AND s.member_id = #{userId} order by 1 desc
mapper.insert: insert into reservation ( reservation_id, user_id, store_seq, reservation_date, reservation_time, num_guests, status, created_at, updated_at ) values ( reservation_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{storeSeq}, #{reservationDate}, #{reservationTime}, #{numGuests}, #{status}, sysdate, null )
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, s.name AS storeName FROM reservation r JOIN store s ON r.store_seq = s.store_seq WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.reservation_date DESC, reservation_time desc
SELECT cancellation_time FROM ( SELECT cancellation_time FROM cancellation_records WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY cancellation_time DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT r.updated_at AS no_show_time FROM reservation r WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.status = 'no-show' AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY r.updated_at DESC
